dict.acceptation: 疾病；某种具体疾病；不健康；

sent.orig: Life is full of illness. Disease is illness, family dispute is illness, social unrest is illness.
sent.trans: 人生多病！身体四大不调是病，家人吵嚷不和是病，社会运烫不字也是病。

sent.orig: But an illness of life, is not renunciation first and foremost an illness of the spirit?
sent.trans: 但是摆脱生活的疾病，首先要脱离的不是灵魂的疾病。

sent.orig: Mortality of serious illness case of illness is tall, sequela is serious.
sent.trans: 重症病例死亡率高，后遗症严重。

sent.orig: You look down and see aging, illness, and death coming up the pole, in pursuit.
sent.trans: 你朝下看，看见老、病、死朝著旗杆追上来。

sent.orig: Heredity also plays a role in some types of mental illness.
sent.trans: 遗传在某些精神病中也有作用。
